mapper.sql: A.id AS id,A.unique_id AS uniqueId,A.corpid AS corpid,A.time_ymd AS timeYmd,A.dept_unique_id AS deptUniqueId,A.dept_name AS deptName,A.online_duration AS onlineDuration,A.logon_time AS logonTime,A.talk_count AS talkCount,A.individual_talk_count AS individualTalkCount,A.group_talk_count AS groupTalkCount,A.talk_duration AS talkDuration,A.individual_talk_duration AS individualTalkDuration,A.group_talk_duration AS groupTalkDuration,A.video_all_count AS videoAllCount,A.video_call_count AS videoCallCount,A.video_upload_count AS videoUploadCount,A.video_rollcall_count AS videoRollcallCount,A.video_conf_count AS videoConfCount,A.video_duration AS videoDuration,A.sos_count AS sosCount,A.photo_upload_count AS photoUploadCount,A.im_count AS imCount,A.individual_im_count AS individualImCount,A.group_im_count AS groupImCount,A.onpost_duration AS onpostDuration,A.mileage AS mileage,A.tmp_group_count AS tmpGroupCount,A.tmp_group_file_count AS tmpGroupFileCount,A.state AS state,A.update_time AS updateTime

if.test: ascOrDesc != null and ascOrDesc !='' and selfOrder == null

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO (unique_id,corpid,time_ymd,dept_unique_id,dept_name,online_duration,logon_time,talk_count,individual_talk_count,group_talk_count,talk_duration,individual_talk_duration,group_talk_duration,video_all_count,video_call_count,video_upload_count,video_rollcall_count,video_conf_count,video_duration,sos_count,photo_upload_count,im_count,individual_im_count,group_im_count,onpost_duration,mileage,tmp_group_count,tmp_group_file_count,state,update_time) VALUES (#{c.uniqueId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{c.corpid,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.timeYmd,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.deptUniqueId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{c.deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{c.onlineDuration,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{c.logonTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{c.talkCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.individualTalkCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.groupTalkCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.talkDuration,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.individualTalkDuration,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.groupTalkDuration,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.videoAllCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.videoCallCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.videoUploadCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.videoRollcallCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.videoConfCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.videoDuration,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.sosCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.photoUploadCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.imCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.individualImCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.groupImCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.onpostDuration,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.mileage,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{c.tmpGroupCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.tmpGroupFileCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.state,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE online_duration = IF(VALUES(online_duration) <= 0, online_duration, online_duration+VALUES(online_duration)), talk_count = IF(VALUES(talk_count) <= 0, talk_count, talk_count+VALUES(talk_count)), individual_talk_count = IF(VALUES(individual_talk_count) <= 0, individual_talk_count, individual_talk_count+VALUES(individual_talk_count)), group_talk_count = IF(VALUES(group_talk_count) <= 0, group_talk_count, group_talk_count+VALUES(group_talk_count)), talk_duration = IF(VALUES(talk_duration) <= 0, talk_duration, talk_duration+VALUES(talk_duration)), individual_talk_duration = IF(VALUES(individual_talk_duration) <= 0, individual_talk_duration, individual_talk_duration+VALUES(individual_talk_duration)), group_talk_duration = IF(VALUES(group_talk_duration) <= 0, group_talk_duration, group_talk_duration+VALUES(group_talk_duration)), video_all_count = IF(VALUES(video_all_count) <= 0, video_all_count, video_all_count+VALUES(video_all_count)), video_call_count = IF(VALUES(video_call_count) <= 0, video_call_count, video_call_count+VALUES(video_call_count)), video_upload_count = IF(VALUES(video_upload_count) <= 0, video_upload_count, video_upload_count+VALUES(video_upload_count)), video_rollcall_count = IF(VALUES(video_rollcall_count) <= 0, video_rollcall_count, video_rollcall_count+VALUES(video_rollcall_count)), video_conf_count = IF(VALUES(video_conf_count) <= 0, video_conf_count, video_conf_count+VALUES(video_conf_count)), video_duration = IF(VALUES(video_duration) <= 0, video_duration, video_duration+VALUES(video_duration)), sos_count = IF(VALUES(sos_count) <= 0, sos_count, sos_count+VALUES(sos_count)), photo_upload_count = IF(VALUES(photo_upload_count) <= 0, photo_upload_count, photo_upload_count+VALUES(photo_upload_count)), im_count = IF(VALUES(im_count) <= 0, im_count, im_count+VALUES(im_count)), individual_im_count = IF(VALUES(individual_im_count) <= 0, individual_im_count, individual_im_count+VALUES(individual_im_count)), group_im_count = IF(VALUES(group_im_count) <= 0, group_im_count, group_im_count+VALUES(group_im_count)), onpost_duration = IF(VALUES(onpost_duration) <= 0, onpost_duration, onpost_duration+VALUES(onpost_duration)), mileage = IF(VALUES(mileage) <= 0, mileage, mileage+VALUES(mileage)), tmp_group_count = IF(VALUES(tmp_group_count) <= 0, tmp_group_count, tmp_group_count+VALUES(tmp_group_count)), tmp_group_file_count = IF(VALUES(tmp_group_file_count) <= 0, tmp_group_file_count, tmp_group_file_count+VALUES(tmp_group_file_count)), update_time = VALUES(update_time)

INSERT INTO (unique_id,corpid,time_ymd,dept_unique_id,dept_name,online_duration,logon_time,talk_count,individual_talk_count,group_talk_count,talk_duration,individual_talk_duration,group_talk_duration,video_all_count,video_call_count,video_upload_count,video_rollcall_count,video_conf_count,video_duration,sos_count,photo_upload_count,im_count,individual_im_count,group_im_count,onpost_duration,mileage,tmp_group_count,tmp_group_file_count,state,update_time) VALUES (#{c.uniqueId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{c.corpid,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.timeYmd,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.deptUniqueId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{c.deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{c.onlineDuration,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{c.logonTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{c.talkCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.individualTalkCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.groupTalkCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.talkDuration,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.individualTalkDuration,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.groupTalkDuration,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.videoAllCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.videoCallCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.videoUploadCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.videoRollcallCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.videoConfCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.videoDuration,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.sosCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.photoUploadCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.imCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.individualImCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.groupImCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.onpostDuration,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.mileage,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{c.tmpGroupCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.tmpGroupFileCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.state,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{c.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE online_duration = IF(VALUES(online_duration) <= 0, online_duration, online_duration+VALUES(online_duration)), talk_duration = IF(VALUES(talk_duration) <= 0, talk_duration, talk_duration+VALUES(talk_duration)), individual_talk_duration = IF(VALUES(individual_talk_duration) <= 0, individual_talk_duration, individual_talk_duration+VALUES(individual_talk_duration)), group_talk_duration = IF(VALUES(group_talk_duration) <= 0, group_talk_duration, group_talk_duration+VALUES(group_talk_duration)), video_duration = IF(VALUES(video_duration) <= 0, video_duration, video_duration+VALUES(video_duration)), onpost_duration = IF(VALUES(onpost_duration) <= 0, onpost_duration, onpost_duration+VALUES(onpost_duration)), update_time = VALUES(update_time)
mapper.select: select * from sta_day_dept where dept_unique_id = #{uniqueId} and time_ymd = #{date}

select id, corpid, time_ymd, dept_unique_id, dept_name, online_duration, logon_time, talk_count, individual_talk_count, group_talk_count, talk_duration, individual_talk_duration, group_talk_duration, video_all_count, video_call_count, video_upload_count, video_rollcall_count, video_conf_count, video_duration, sos_count, photo_upload_count, im_count, individual_im_count, group_im_count, onpost_duration, mileage, tmp_group_count, tmp_group_file_count, state, update_time from sta_day_dept
time_ymd >= #{timeYmd}

select dept_unique_id, dept_name, sum(individual_talk_count) individual_talk_count, sum(group_talk_count) group_talk_count from sta_day_dept
dept_unique_id in (${uniqueIdIn})
and time_ymd like CONCAT(#{date}, '%')
group by dept_unique_id, dept_name

select dept_unique_id, dept_name, sum(individual_talk_duration) individual_talk_duration, sum(group_talk_duration) group_talk_duration from sta_day_dept
dept_unique_id in (${uniqueIdIn})
and time_ymd like CONCAT(#{date}, '%')
group by dept_unique_id, dept_name

select dept_unique_id, dept_name, sum(video_call_count) video_call_count, sum(video_upload_count) video_upload_count, sum(video_rollcall_count) video_rollcall_count, sum(video_conf_count) video_conf_count from sta_day_dept
dept_unique_id in (${uniqueIdIn})
and time_ymd like CONCAT(#{date}, '%')
group by dept_unique_id, dept_name

select dept_unique_id, dept_name, sum(video_duration) video_duration from sta_day_dept
dept_unique_id in (${uniqueIdIn})
and time_ymd like CONCAT(#{date}, '%')
group by dept_unique_id, dept_name

select dept_unique_id, dept_name, sum(photo_upload_count) photo_upload_count from sta_day_dept
dept_unique_id in (${uniqueIdIn})
and time_ymd like CONCAT(#{date}, '%')
group by dept_unique_id, dept_name

select dept_unique_id, dept_name, sum(sos_count) sos_count from sta_day_dept
dept_unique_id in (${uniqueIdIn})
and time_ymd like CONCAT(#{date}, '%')
group by dept_unique_id, dept_name

select dept_unique_id, dept_name, sum(individual_im_count) individual_im_count, sum(group_im_count) group_im_count from sta_day_dept
dept_unique_id in (${uniqueIdIn})
and time_ymd like CONCAT(#{date}, '%')
group by dept_unique_id, dept_name

select dept_unique_id, dept_name, sum(online_duration) online_duration from sta_day_dept
dept_unique_id in (${uniqueIdIn})
and time_ymd like CONCAT(#{date}, '%')
group by dept_unique_id, dept_name

select dept_unique_id, dept_name, sum(onpost_duration) onpost_duration from sta_day_dept
dept_unique_id in (${uniqueIdIn})
and time_ymd like CONCAT(#{date}, '%')
group by dept_unique_id, dept_name

select dept_unique_id, dept_name, sum(mileage) mileage from sta_day_dept
dept_unique_id in (${uniqueIdIn})
and time_ymd like CONCAT(#{date}, '%')
group by dept_unique_id, dept_name

select dept_unique_id, dept_name, sum(tmp_group_count) tmp_group_count from sta_day_dept
dept_unique_id in (${uniqueIdIn})
and time_ymd like CONCAT(#{date}, '%')
group by dept_unique_id, dept_name

select dept_unique_id, dept_name, sum(1) talk_count from sta_user_online_record
dept_unique_id in (${uniqueIdIn})
and logoff_time is null
and `real` != 1
group by dept_unique_id, dept_name

select count(*) from sta_user_online_record
dept_unique_id in
#{uniqueId}
and logoff_time is null
and `real` != 1
SELECT FROM A WHERE A.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
SELECT FROM A WHERE A.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
SELECT FROM A LIMIT 0,1
SELECT FROM A
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM A
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO unique_id, corpid, time_ymd, dept_unique_id, dept_name, online_duration, logon_time, talk_count, individual_talk_count, group_talk_count, talk_duration, individual_talk_duration, group_talk_duration, video_all_count, video_call_count, video_upload_count, video_rollcall_count, video_conf_count, video_duration, sos_count, photo_upload_count, im_count, individual_im_count, group_im_count, onpost_duration, mileage, tmp_group_count, tmp_group_file_count, state, update_time, #{uniqueId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{corpid,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{timeYmd,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{deptUniqueId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{onlineDuration,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{logonTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{talkCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{individualTalkCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{groupTalkCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{talkDuration,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{individualTalkDuration,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{groupTalkDuration,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{videoAllCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{videoCallCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{videoUploadCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{videoRollcallCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{videoConfCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{videoDuration,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{sosCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{photoUploadCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{imCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{individualImCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{groupImCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{onpostDuration,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{mileage,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{tmpGroupCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{tmpGroupFileCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
